title: Robert Hammond, Co-Founder Of Friends Of The High Line
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Robert Hammond, co-founder of Friends of the High Line, an innovative re-development company. Harris also talks with Darrell Cavens, co-founder of Zulily.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Robert Hammond, co-founder of Friends of the High Line, an innovative re-development company. Harris also talks with Darrell Cavens, co-founder of Zulily.
